Text:
Hey, thanks a lot for this Schon55! I have been a big Cannonball Adderly fan for some time also. I also had an old copy this on vinyl years ago. I have not heard it in a long time.
You are fortunate indeed that you got to see this band perform live. I once read that Dimitri Shostakovich  was sitting on the edge of his seat in awe when he saw Cannonball Adderly perform live. It must have been a great performance indeed!
